Topic: Draw a string telephone between two students.
Evidence Statements: The student can illustrate two students using a string telephone to communicate over a distance.
The student can demonstrate the use of sound as a means of communication in their drawing.
The student can show the materials used to build the string telephone, such as cups and string.
The student can depict how the string telephone allows information to be sent and received between the students.
The student can include elements that represent how technologies like the string telephone help people communicate over distances.
